items.summary: Remove all image URL / photo link fields and image rendering from the TeamMembersPage. Replace any photo avatars with a fallback initials-based avatar for every team member card so the page no longer depends on external image links.

Fix the backend visitor log so that all stored entry fields (visitor name, timestamp, and any other persisted fields) are correctly returned by the log-retrieval function and are visible in the AdminPanel log entries list.

Fix the AdminPanel page to correctly display all fields of each visitor log entry (name, timestamp, and any additional fields) returned from the backend. Each row in the log table/list must show the visitor's name and the time they visited.

Ensure that when a user enters their name on the LoginPage and proceeds to view the project, that name is stored in the backend visitor log (logVisitor call) with the current timestamp before navigating away. The logVisitor mutation must fire and complete successfully on name submission.
